transcript: I can't help it. I know her best. I was brought up next door to her. These years when I think of somebody for my wife I think of Annie. Do you want to diagram?

segments.text: I can't help it. I know her best. I was brought up next door to her. These years when I think of somebody for my wife I think of Annie.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I can't help it.  I know her best.  I was brought up next door to here, the easiest, when I think of somebody for my wife, I think of Annie.  Do you want a diagram?
